course.name: javascript
course.desciption: DOM or Document Object Model is a way of communicating with HTML elements within a web page. DOM provides functionality for searching, modifying, removing elements within an HTML document. We also have the ability to search for elements and count them.
course.author: Nguyen Thuan

course.name: Java
course.desciption: DOM or Document Object Model is a way of communicating with HTML elements within a web page. DOM provides functionality for searching, modifying, removing elements within an HTML document. We also have the ability to search for elements and count them.
course.author: Nguyen Quang

course.name: PHP
course.desciption: DOM or Document Object Model is a way of communicating with HTML elements within a web page. DOM provides functionality for searching, modifying, removing elements within an HTML document. We also have the ability to search for elements and count them.
course.author: Nguyen Manh Ha

course.name: Asp .net
course.desciption: DOM or Document Object Model is a way of communicating with HTML elements within a web page. DOM provides functionality for searching, modifying, removing elements within an HTML document. We also have the ability to search for elements and count them. Elements are represented as a tree of nodes.
course.author: Thuan Nguyen Khac
